attributes.action: Pay rise for Nurses in the NHS (angel nurses as Boris Johnson once said).
attributes.additional_details: Doctors & dentists are getting a 2.8% pay rise, it’s only fair to give the same reward to nurses as well as other NHS staff that have been the real heroes through the pandemic.
attributes.background: Give nurses a 2.8% pay rise after all their hard work during the pandemic and now, it’s not fair that they are exempt.
